session.title: v0.2.0 Release Readiness Assessment and Completion
session.objective: Evaluate v0.2.0 release plan against codebase, close remaining P0 issues, fix CI workflows, and prepare for release

sessionLogCompleted.evidence: Session log contains all required sections: session, protocolCompliance, context, requirements, work_completed, decisions, outcomes

markdownLinted.evidence: markdownlint-cli2 run multiple times on PLAN.md with 0 errors

changesCommitted.evidence: Committing PLAN.md + session log with protocol compliance fixes

blocking.description: Evaluate current codebase state against v0.2.0 PLAN.md
blocking.evidence: Comprehensive status report generated showing 60% P0 completion

blocking.description: Close 4 P0 issues with implementation complete but not formally closed
blocking.evidence: Issues #265, #755, #756, #829 closed via Session 15 with documented evidence

blocking.description: Fix 2 CI workflow failures blocking release
blocking.evidence: Memory Validation and PR Maintenance workflows fixed via PR #982 (Session 16)

blocking.description: Update PLAN.md to reflect accurate release status
blocking.evidence: PLAN.md updated with 100% P0 completion, 6/6 DoD criteria, READY FOR RELEASE status

analysis.description: Comprehensive evaluation of codebase against release plan
findings: Plan claimed 100% P0 completion but actual was 60% (4 issues not formally closed)
Critical Path 2 (Security) marked COMPLETE but issues not closed
2 CI workflows failing on main branch

issues_closed.title: Pre-PR Validation System Epic
issues_closed.evidence: All 7 sub-issues closed, 4 planning docs created

ci_fixes.root_cause: Exit code 129 when github.event.before SHA doesn't exist on force-push
ci_fixes.fix: Added parent commit fallback and graceful skip logic

ci_fixes.root_cause: Null reference error when no open PRs (PowerShell array unrolling issue)

technical.decision: Defer Critical Path 4 (Memory System) to v0.3.0
technical.rationale: 5 issues (#850, #734, #731, #751, #747) not blocking core functionality; can be improved iteratively
alternatives_considered: Complete Memory System before release (would delay by 5-7 days)
technical.chosen_approach: Defer entire CP4 to v0.3.0 milestone

process.decision: Update PLAN.md to show accurate current state
process.rationale: Plan-reality tracking gap was HIGH risk; documentation must reflect actual GitHub state

deliverables.evidence: PR #982 fixes both Memory Validation and PR Maintenance workflows

next_actions: Verify all workflows green on main
Move Memory System issues to v0.3.0 milestone

serena_memories.content: v0.2.0 release achieved 100% P0 completion through 3 coordinated sessions (14-16). Pattern: evaluate plan → close issues → fix CI → update documentation.

lessons_learned.lesson: Plan-reality tracking gap can reach HIGH risk when documentation diverges from actual state
lessons_learned.impact: Plan showed 100% complete but reality was 60%; caused confusion and delayed release assessment
lessons_learned.prevention: Verify GitHub issue state before claiming completion in planning docs

lessons_learned.lesson: Implementation complete does not equal issue closed
lessons_learned.impact: 4 P0 issues had working code and tests but remained open, blocking release
lessons_learned.prevention: Formal issue closure step must be part of implementation workflow

agent_handoffs.outcome: Comprehensive status report with gap analysis

metadata.agent_coordination: Delegated to deep-executor for orchestration of analyst, implementer, devops agents
